messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyQR-scanning-nodes project?
The project provides ComfyUI nodes to quickly test generated QR codes for scannability.
Where can I find the source code for ComfyQR-scanning-nodes?
The project is managed publicly on Gitlab (https://gitlab.com/sofuego-comfy-nodes/ComfyQR-scanning-nodes) but is also mirrored on Github (https://github.com/coreyryanhanson/ComfyQR-scanning-nodes).
What is the function of the Read QR Code node?
The node extracts text data from a QR code using the pyzbar library.
What is the purpose of the Validate QR Code node?
The node checks whether text extracted from a QR code is valid and matches the specified text.
What are the inputs required for the Validate QR Code node?
The node requires the image layer, the extracted text from the Read QR Code node, the protocol and the text of the QR code.
Why is pyzbar chosen as the QR reader library?
Pyzbar is chosen for its low dependencies, regular updates, and popularity.
How can the accuracy of QR code readability be improved?
Adding a Pad Image for Outpainting node before sending the image to Read QR Code can help to reduce false negatives when the border size of a QR code is small.
